/usr/bin/c++ CMakeFiles/audioStreamer.dir/audioStreamer.cpp.o -o audioStreamer   -L/opt/local/lib  -Wl,-rpath,/opt/local/lib /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_program_options.so.1.71.0 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_log.so.1.71.0 -lportaudio -pthread /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_chrono.so.1.71.0 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_date_time.so.1.71.0 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_filesystem.so.1.71.0 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_regex.so.1.71.0 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_thread.so.1.71.0 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_atomic.so.1.71.0 -lpthread
